name: Twin Hooks
description:
Twin Hooks is a 2D Grappling Platformer in which players use two hooks to traverse environments and solve puzzles. Use one hook to pull and swing yourself far & high and another to pull objects toward you - at the same time!

Submission for the Global Game Jam 2022. Made in Unity Engine.

Credits: 

Cameron Lynch - Producer, Level Designer (Webpage)

Edward Luo - Programmer (Webpage)

Greg Morton - Lead Designer, Sound Designer (Webpage)

Joe Greive - Programmer, Art Director, Sound Designer, Unity Implementation  (Webpage)
